item.title: Books
item.description:
2025

  • Laut Bercerita by Leila S. Chudori

2024

  • Building a Second Brain by Tiago Forte
  • The Fall by Albert Camus
  • The Stone Grows by Albert Camus
  • The Myth of Sisyphus by Albert Camus
  • The Metamorphosis by Franz Kafka
  • The Picture of Dorian Gray by Oscar Wilde
  • Namaku Alam by Leila S. Chudori

2023

  • Aku Ini Binatang Jalang by Chairil Anwar
  • The Stranger by Albert Camus
  • Norwegian Wood by Haruki Murakami
  • Sepotong Senja Untuk Pacarku by Seno Gumira Ajidarma

2022

  • Pulang by Leila S. Chudori
  • Filosofi Teras by Henry Manampiring

item.title: Uses
item.description:
Hardware

  • Laptop: Asus VivoBook X407UB

Software & Tools

Development

  • Editor: Zed, VS Code & Neovim
  • API Client: Yaak
  • Database: DBeaver
  • Terminal: Alacritty
  • OS: Fedora Sway Tiling WM

Productivity

  • Notes: Obsidian & Notesnook
  • Task Manager: TicTick
  • Browser: Zen Browser
  • Password Manager: Bitwarden
  • Flashcards: Anki

Mobile

  • YouTube: NewPipe
  • Launcher: Olauncher

This Site

  • Generator: Hugo
  • Hosting: Cloudflare Pages
  • Repository: GitHub
